definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Some local businessmen proposed to raise a comfort fund for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 当地一些商人提议向地震受害者筹集抚恤金。

sentences.english: What should we do to raise money for them?
sentences.chinese: 为他们筹集一些钱我们应做什么？

sentences.english: The foundation was set up to collect funds for the boy.
sentences.chinese: 该基金会的建立是为萨帕马加筹集资金。

sentences.english: The good news is that US$1.9 billion has been pledged, in loans and grants.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是筹集了19亿美元的贷款和资助金。

sentences.english: A securities company must undertake its self-operated business by using its own capital and lawfully raised funds.
sentences.chinese: 自营业务必须使用自有资金和依法筹集的资金。

sentences.english: Some cooperatives, for example, raise money for research into important crops.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一些合作社筹集资金研究重要农作物。

sentences.english: Road-toll is an efficient way to collect capital for road building.
sentences.chinese: 公路收费是筹集公路建设资金的一种行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: The raising of twenty-five thousand pounds was a task altogether beyond her powers.
sentences.chinese: 要筹集两万五千镑钱她完全无力办得到。

sentences.english: They are trying by all possible means to raise funds.
sentences.chinese: 法务省准备通过个人集资筹集资金。

sentences.english: When a company sells shares of itself to the public to raise capital .
sentences.chinese: 一家公司通过向社会公众出售其股票筹集资本的行为。

sentences.english: Mr. Dai said the pension program's funding channels need to be broadened.
sentences.chinese: 戴相龙表示，社保基金的资金筹集渠道需要扩展。

sentences.english: Finally in 1975, the team went to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 个女队员进行训练，筹集登山的资金。

sentences.english: The balance will be sought from governments and other International Financial Institutions.
sentences.chinese: 余款将从各国政府和其他国际金融机构筹集。

sentences.english: Nowadays a lot of startups don't want to raise multi-million dollar series A rounds.
sentences.chinese: 很多初创企业不愿进行动辄上百万的首轮资金筹集。

sentences.english: If you plan to raise venture capital, set up an Inc.
sentences.chinese: 如果你打算筹集风险资本，那么就建立股份有限公司。

sentences.english: We are planning to collect 780,000 yuan for the wild life project at present.
sentences.chinese: 我们目前计划为野生动物工程筹集78万元。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
